# KNHKS - Knowledge Graph Hot Path System

## v0.4.0 Release Validation

To validate v0.4.0 release readiness, run:

```bash
make validate-v0.4.0
```

Or directly:

```bash
./scripts/validate_v0.4.0.sh
```

For interactive release checklist:

```bash
./scripts/release_checklist.sh
```

See [Definition of Done](docs/VERSION_0.4.0_DEFINITION_OF_DONE.md) for complete criteria.
